wikipedia_page.main: Garry Mountford (born 26 November 1983 in Wakefield, England) is a Scottish rugby union player who plays for Stirling County. He previously played for Glasgow Warriors at the Tighthead Prop position.

response: *Garry Mountford (born 1983), Scottish rugby union player who plays for Stirling County
